document.full_text: news and information provider thomson reuters corp's revenue growth accelerated in the first quarter as it reaped the benefits of heavy spending on new products, and the company said it plans to sell two more businesses to fund further investment.
document.title: thomson reuters revenue rises, plans divestitures
lines_and_colors: news and information provider thomson reuters corp's revenue growth accelerated in the first quarter as it reaped the benefits of heavy spending on new products, and the company said it plans to sell two more businesses to fund further investment.
